title: MacVG v.1.2 Update
description: Well, to be honest, we didn't put that much effort into this update since we're focusing on the overall MacWeb app tree and file organization stuff. During this update, there were quite a few changes to MacWeb and it was chaotic. So here they are, our first steps toward the best, the most feature-packed, and the most modern game site out there!

mainarticles.p1: There's a new button next to the search bar on the home page that selects a random game for more convenient and easier game browsing ðŸŽ²!
mainarticles.p2: 4 handy buttons 4 better gaming experience! Now you can use Fullscreen to play games, Back to go back to homepage, Favorites and Download coming in November Update ðŸ“…!
mainarticles.p3: MacVG will recieve monthly updates on the first day of the month with new features ðŸ˜Ž!

others.other1: Fixed where the Tool Bar isn't showing or too small.
others.other3: Fixed Random Game Selector not working.
others.other4: Removed 5 games for maintainance and crashing issues.
